name: babel-plugin-transform-array-like-string
description: Babel plugin to turn string indexers into String.prototype.charAt() calls.

scripts.test:coverage: isparta cover --include-all-sources --report html --report text --root src/ node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha
scripts.watch:coverage: cross-env SHELL=/bin/sh tools/chokidar "{src,test}/**/*" --command "isparta cover --include-all-sources --report html --report text --root src/ node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha"

author: Tanix <pwdtnx@gmail.com>
